text: @argyris Don't recall that name...
@argyris The older one briefly dated the American Ambassador's (Nick Burns?) daughter.
@argyris I also remember Clinton visiting and there being crazy riots downtown. I think we had school off for a few days during his visit.

@argyris Crazy fact: it turned out (we had no idea at the time) that Arkan's (notorious Serbian war lord) sons went to ACS under pseudonyms.

@argyris Several of my friends were American diplomats. Their parents drove in cars with armor. Crazy times.
